metadata.description: Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

parameters.$select: admin_name, admin_userid, admin_assignedvia, admin_groupname, admin_groupid, admin_securityrolename, admin_securityroleid, admin_securityroletemplateid, admin_businessunitname, admin_userstatus
parameters.$filter: _admin_environment_value eq @{triggerBody()['text']} and admin_securityroletemplateid eq @{outputs('SecurityRoleTemplateID')} and admin_businessunitname eq '@{outputs('RemoveSpecialCharactersBU')}'

Remove_It_Filter_-_Direct.inputs: _admin_environment_value eq @{triggerBody()['text']} and admin_name eq '@{outputs('RemoveSpecialChars')}' and admin_assignedvia eq '@{items('Remove_deleted_from_inventory')?['AssignedVia']}' and admin_securityroletemplateid eq '@{items('Remove_deleted_from_inventory')?['SRTemplateID']}' and admin_businessunitname eq '@{outputs('RemoveSpecialCharactersBU')}'

Remove_It_Filter_-_Group.inputs: _admin_environment_value eq @{triggerBody()['text']} and admin_name eq '@{outputs('RemoveSpecialChars')}' and admin_assignedvia eq '@{items('Remove_deleted_from_inventory')?['AssignedVia']}' and admin_securityroletemplateid eq '@{items('Remove_deleted_from_inventory')?['SRTemplateID']}' and admin_businessunitname eq '@{outputs('RemoveSpecialCharactersBU')}' and admin_groupid eq '@{items('Remove_deleted_from_inventory')?['GroupID']}'

catch_-_for_now_aad_groups_only.inputs: catch - for now aad groups only

Temp_-_remove_in_August_2023.description: added BU after first ship. delete all records without BU as a result so that we can assume they are never null

Temp_-_remove_in_Oct_2023.description: some process temp adds the users without user name which is not supported. remvoe these

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date
